signUpMsg: Sign up to see photos and videos from your friends.
cloneMsg: This is only a project to test my skills and learn firebase. Use fake data to check out the clone.
resetMsg: Enter your account email address and we'll send you a link to get back into your account.
emailSent: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox.
auth/email-already-in-use: The provided email is already in use by an existing user.
auth/weak-password: Password should be at least 6 characters.
auth/invalid-password: The provided value for the password user property is invalid.
auth/invalid-username: The provided value for the username user property is invalid.
auth/invalid-fullname: The provided value for the full name user property is invalid.
auth/user-not-found: There is no existing user record corresponding to the provided identifier.
auth/wrong-password: Sorry, your password was incorrect. Please double-check your password.
auth/too-many-requests: Sorry, you entered wrong credentials too many times. Try again later.
auth/username-already-in-use: This username isn't available. Please try another.
